newsitem.title: GERMANY: Schmalbach sees further profit growth in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Schmalbach sees further profit growth in 1997.

text.p: German packaging producer Schmalbach-Lubeca said on Monday that the basis was in place for further revenue growth in 1997.

"After a pleasing result in 1996, we are looking to the future with confidence. Schmalbach-Lubeca has been strenghtened by a restructuring of our produce portfolio and that has established a basis for further profit growth in 1997," the company said in a statement.
Schmalbach-Lubeca is a unit of the diversified utility Viag AG. The company reported operating profit for 1996 of 190 million marks ($112.3 million), up from 118 million in 1995.
